title: Send Building-Wide Notice
description: The water will be shut off for repairs in an apartment building. The PM must notify all residents.

tasks.description: Draft a clear notice explaining the reason, date, and time of the water shut-off.
tasks.expected_outcome: A clear, concise notice is written.

tasks.description: Generate a list of all current tenants in the specified building.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent pulls a complete list of resident emails and phone numbers for the building.

tasks.description: Send the notice to all residents via a bulk email and SMS blast.
tasks.expected_outcome: The notice is successfully delivered to all residents through multiple channels.
